pullrequest.title: Add servicesim job to job DSLs.

content.raw: I've simplified the gpu tagging mechanism in [8a1262a](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/8a1262a92aedd48edfa2799c3d45646116e45dc3?at=default) . Remove the function since we only support one distro \(no more logic needed\) and use the generic `gpu-reliable`. We don't need to use `gpu-reliable-${distro}` anymore since we transitioned to nvidia-docker which handles GPU support in docker transparently.
content.html: I've simplified the gpu tagging mechanism in 8a1262a . Remove the function since we only support one distro (no more logic needed) and use the generic gpu-reliable.
